original_text: Once, on being asked by the Pharisees when the kingdom of God would come, Jesus replied, “The coming of the kingdom of God is not something that can be observed,
korean_text: 바리새인들이 하나님의 나라가 어느 때에 임하나이까 묻거늘 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 하나님의 나라는 볼 수 있게 임하는 것이 아니요

sentences.original_text: Once, on being asked by the Pharisees
when the kingdom of God would come
The coming of the kingdom of God
is not something that can be observed
